slogan.title: CoStrict
slogan.subTitle: An enterprise-grade AI agent built for serious development

codeReview.subTitle: Code review can perform full repository indexing, as well as company-level coding knowledge base RAG. It supports users in conducting code checks on functions, selected code lines, code files, and entire project files. In identifying and confirming issues, it adopts the strategy of "specialized checks by a multi-expert model" + "cross-confirmation by multiple models."
codeReview.feature01Content: Through deep indexing and semantic analysis of entire codebases, we construct interconnected knowledge graphs. This enables comprehensive reviews with zero blind spots, guarantees no vulnerabilities are missed, and ultimately fortifies your enterprise code security defenses
codeReview.feature02Content: Integrate enterprise coding knowledge base, relying on large model and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) technology to accurately review each line of code, making Code Review perfectly fit the enterprise business scenario
codeReview.feature03Content: Simulation architects, security experts, test engineers, and other roles can fully discover general issues, memory issues, security vulnerabilities, performance bottlenecks, and other specialized problems in the code. Let every line of code undergo a "multi-expert joint consultation" to discover as many potential risks as possible
codeReview.feature04Content: An original multi-model cross-validation engine, which automatically initiates multi-model cross-analysis verification for each code issue, ensuring that every problem is subject to "triple expert consultation," reducing the false alarm rate and truly achieving "Finding the problem is solving it"

strictMode.subTitle: Strict Mode standardizes the process of AI-generated code, making it more aligned with enterprise development scenarios. It systematically breaks down a single requirement into steps such as：Requirements Analysis, Architecture Design, Task Planning and Test Generation etc. acting as a standardized procedure for AI to ensure high-quality and highly controllable output.
strictMode.feature01Content: The project documentation function supports organizing information such as the structure, interfaces, and specifications of historical code, ensuring that subsequently generated code maintains consistency with the existing architectural style, achieves seamless integration, and remains high-quality.
strictMode.feature02Content: CoStrict systematically deconstructs user requirements into multiple modules, including requirement clarification, design, and task breakdown. Each module is customizable, ensuring highly controllable and superior quality outcomes.
strictMode.feature03Content: Code Quality, Built-In from the Start.CoStrict creates tests before writing any code. Its automated test-first cycle ensures every line must meet strict quality checks, guaranteeing solid and reliable code from the ground up.

completion.title: Code Completion
completion.subTitle: Code auto-completion, automatically generates subsequent code based on the cursor's context code, quickly outputs code in seconds

moreTool.title: More Features
moreTool.subTitle: CoStrict supports various external tools, such as: MCP, custom API/model services, multi-mode selection/custom mode and image context features etc
moreTool.feature01Content: The MCP server provides additional tools and resources to assist CoStrict in completing tasks beyond its built-in functionalities, such as accessing databases, customizing APIs, and specialized features
moreTool.feature02Content: Supports access to various API service providers, such as Anthropic, OpenAI, etc. You can configure any API compatible with OpenAI, or access local models through LM Studio/Ollama. If you use the default CoStrict, there are also various advanced models available, such as claude-sonnet-4，etc
moreTool.feature03Content: Multiple modes correspond to multiple professional roles, and CoStrict's behavior can be intelligently adjusted according to your current task. You can also customize modes and Prompts according to your needs
moreTool.feature04Content: Click the image button below the dialog box, or shift + drag the image into the input box to add visual context to the chat
moreTool.feature05Content: Code auto-completion, automatically generates subsequent code based on the cursor's context code, quickly outputs code in seconds
moreTool.feature06Content: Vibe Mode is designed for rapid development and simple tasks. It supports multi-turn natural language dialogue, allowing for real-time refinement and precise code generation.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Private Deployment
enterprise.subTitle: To ensure data security, superior service, and reduced costs, we offer comprehensive professional on-premises deployment solutions
enterprise.feature01Content: On-premises deployment ensures full lifecycle security for enterprise code through physical isolation and end-to-end encryption. Code never traverses external networks - sensitive assets like proprietary algorithms and API keys remain entirely within your infrastructure
enterprise.feature02Content: Our open-source codebase enables extensive customization through APIs, allowing seamless integration with workflows and business systems. By deeply contextualizing enterprise knowledge, it powers AI-assisted decision making and task automation – driving transformative business efficiency gains
enterprise.feature03Content: Leveraging AI-powered generation, automated testing, and deep inspection, development cycles are dramatically shortened while resource allocation becomes significantly more efficient. Our AI Quality Guardian supercharges development, delivering exceptionally reliable and superior software products
enterprise.feature04Content: For large teams, a one-time investment offers greater cost advantages compared to long-term SaaS subscriptions. Moreover, CoStrict significantly reduces computational resource and token consumption through engineered capabilities such as prompt optimization, precise contextual retrieval, and adaptive model matching.

openSource.title: Open Source and Free
openSource.desc: Welcome to join us and make AI more efficient!

download.title: CoStrict
download.desc: CoStrict is an open source and practical AI programmer that implements functions such as code completion, intelligent Q&A, code review, code optimization, single test writing, and comment generation based on the open source big model.
download.vscodeTitle: Install CoStrict Code in Visual Studio Code, requiring the latest version or version 1.86.3 or above
download.jetbrainsTitle: For best compatibility, JetBrains IDE version 2023.3 or higher is required
download.installSteps: The installation steps are as follows:
download.step1Title: Open the Extentions Market, Search for ' CoStrict' and install it
download.step1Content: When Visual Studio Code is already installed, click on the extension on the left navigation, search for "CoStrict", and then click on the Install button
download.step2Content: After restarting Visual Studio Code, click on the CoStrict icon, use the default Base Url to click "Login to CoStrict".
download.step2Tips: If it is a localized deployment, you need to fill in the URL before clicking Login button.
download.jetbrainsStep1Content1: 1. Download the zip installation package of JetBrains IDEs;
download.jetbrainsStep1Content2: 2. Click Navigation - Plugins, click the settings icon, click Install Plugin from Local in the dropdown menu, and select the downloaded zip file to install
download.manualPluginDownload2: Plugin download speed slow? Switch to a faster download source
download.jetbrainsSupportIdes: supports the following JetBrains series IDEs:

operation.planDesc: If your credits are running low and you can't continue using the premium model, complete the following tasks to get more credits!

activityCard.githubStarDesc: First time clicking star on CoStrict open source project on GitHub, get 200 Credits (automatically effective within 10 minutes)
activityCard.inviteNewUserDesc: Invite new users to register, inviter gets 400 Credits, new user gets 500 Credits.

inviteRules.rule1: For each new user invited to register CoStrict account, new user immediately gets 200 Credits, inviter gets 100 Credits;
inviteRules.rule2: New user downloads CoStrict plugin and stars on GitHub:
inviteRules.rule2a: a. New user gets additional 300 Credits (total 500 Credits).
inviteRules.rule2b: b. Inviter gets additional 300 Credits (total 400 Credits).
inviteRules.rule3: Rewards can be stacked, the more new users invited, the more Credits.

pricing.title: Pricing Plans
pricing.subtitle: Choose the right package according to your actual needs
pricing.tips: Some models are half price at night (8:00 PM - 9:00 AM the next day) and all day on weekends, which can be combined with a 10% discount on auto mode.
